definition: sour/tart/sick at heart/grieved/sore/aching/pedantic/impractical/to make sarcastic remarks about sb/an acid

sentences.english: The results of pharmacokinetics and pharmacodynamics of lidocaine carbonate were compared with those of lidocaine hydrochloride.
sentences.chinese: 將藥代動力學及藥效學研究結果與其鹽酸鹽進行比較。
